camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.proj.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.proj.description: The Google Cloud Functions Project ID.

camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.regi.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.region
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.regi.description: The region where Google Cloud Functions has been deployed.

camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serv.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serv.description: The path to the service account key file that provides credentials for the Google Cloud Functions platform. You must encode this value in base64.
